item.title: 8 Wasted X-Men Movie Characters We Most Hope Marvel Will Redeem In The MCU
item.description: 20th Century Fox wasted and neglected many iconic X-Men characters in its franchise, but Marvel Studios can finally bring them redemption in the MCU.

item.title: Happy Death Day 3 Gets Exciting Update From Star & Director 6 Years After Last Installment
item.description: Happy Death Day 3 has gotten its most promising update yet from star Jessica Rothe and director Christopher Landon years after its last installment.
